reviewText:
Sorority Lingerie Party is fifty-seven minutes long and was released on VHS in 1994. The title is very misleading; I thought it was going to be a bunch of females wearing sexy lingerie and having a slumber party and about half way through the video the lingerie comes off. Only halfway through the video does the title comes anywhere close. Basically you have twenty ladies (one at a time) wearing lingerie and taking it all off or partially off. Also I wonder if the ladies in the video are going to college. Some of them look like they were kicked out of porno school. Most of the ladies are beautiful, but would never make the cover of Penthouse, Playboy, or Hustler. Overall this video falls way short of its title. Below is the segments feature in the video with the exception of two ladies for whom the video did not name. Sorority Lingerie Party gets a B-.

Rachel-Theater & Political Science Major: She quickly undress and becomes semi-nude. Rachel removes one black panty hose at a time to become fully nude at the end of the segment.

Mary-Botany & Business Major: She becomes full nude very fast.

Mellissa-Sociology Major: She starts off wearing beautiful white lingerie and slowly become topless and about a minute later she is naked.  The camera operator does not do a good job showing full body shots of Mellissa being naked.

Andrea-Music Major: Andrea slowly and sexually removes the lingerie to bare all.

Christy-Marketing Major: Christ is wearing black teddy lingerie and only exposes her breasts.

Suzette-Physics Major: She is wearing a white dress and eventually becomes topless; she removes the panty and is mostly bare. Only her black silk stockings remain on her.

Jamie-Psychology Major: She is wearing lavender lingerie. Jamie is fully nude about a quarter in the segment and she has big boobs.

Alex-English Major: Alex is wearing a short blue robe and quickly becomes nude; her air time is very brief.

Five ladies are having a slumber lingerie party and all take it off halfway into the segment.

Tiffany-Mathematics Major: she is wearing white sleep lingerie and is semi-nude.

Shawn-Engineering Major: Shawn is wearing a turquoise babydoll and is talking on the phone. She slowly becomes topless and then fully nude.

Olga-Biology Major: Olga is wearing a white teddy and we only get to see her topless in the mirror.

Leslie-Journalist Major: She is wearing a pink short night gown and becomes topless very quickly. Though we never get to see her fully nude, we do get to see pubic hair.

Darian-Communication Major: Darian is wearing a red bath robe and a two piece lingerie outfit; she becomes topless in a matter of seconds. About halfway into the segment she is nude.

Angie-Accounting & Pre Law Major: Angie is wearing a red nightie and quickly becomes topless and then nude on the sofa.
